PIC.name: TUBING 92" CURLIN NO/DEHP
PIC.description: 92-inch IV administration tubing without DEHP plasticizers
PIC.purpose: Primary infusion line for medication delivery through PICC line

PIC.name: IV EXT .22 MICR FILT 10"
PIC.description: IV extension set with 0.22 micron filter, 10-inch length
PIC.purpose: Filters particulates and air while extending IV line reach

PIC.name: SYRINGE 50-60ML L/L NO NEEDLE
PIC.description: Large volume luer-lock syringe without needle for fluid administration
PIC.purpose: High-volume medication administration and catheter flushing

PIC.name: SYRINGE 10ML L/L NO NDL
PIC.purpose: Standard medication administration and line flushing

PIC.name: SYRINGE 20ML L/L NO NDL
PIC.purpose: Medium volume medication delivery and catheter maintenance

PIC.name: SYRINGE 30ML L/L NO NDL
PIC.purpose: Large volume medication administration and thorough line flushing

PIC.name: NEEDLE 18G X 1" HYPO
PIC.purpose: Drawing up medications from vials and initial venipuncture

PIC.name: NEEDLE 20G X 1"
PIC.purpose: Medication withdrawal and smaller volume injections

PIC.name: SYRINGE 10CC 21G 1" L/L (with needle)
PIC.purpose: Pre-assembled unit for quick medication preparation and injection

PIC.name: SYRINGE 10ML 20G 1" L/L #9644 (with needle)
PIC.purpose: Ready-to-use syringe for medication drawing and administration

PIC.name: SOD CHLOR (250ML/BAG)
PIC.purpose: Primary flush solution and medication diluent for PICC maintenance

PIC.name: IV ADMIN SET 92: D-A-F (combo set)
PIC.description: Complete IV administration set with drip chamber, air filter combo
PIC.purpose: Complete fluid delivery system for PICC line infusions

PIC.name: DRESSING CHANGE PICC/MIDLIN
PIC.description: Complete sterile dressing change kit for PICC/midline catheters
PIC.purpose: Sterile site maintenance and dressing changes

PIC.name: ULTRA SITE 2-WAY CAPLESS VAL
PIC.purpose: Safe medication administration interface for PICC access

PIC.name: IV EXT SET W/14" ULT SITE
PIC.description: 14-inch IV extension set with Ultra Site connector
PIC.purpose: Extends PICC access line while reducing catheter manipulation

PIC.name: HEPARIN L/L FLUSH SYRINGE (100 UNITS/ML)
PIC.description: Pre-filled heparin flush syringe at 100 units/mL concentration
PIC.purpose: Maintains catheter patency and prevents clot formation

PIC.name: HEPARIN L/F SYR (3ML/SYR) (10 UNITS/ML)
PIC.purpose: Low-concentration heparin for sensitive patients or pediatric use

PIC.name: GRIPPER PLUS 22G 3/4"
PIC.purpose: Safe access for implanted ports when used with PICC patients who also have ports

PIC.name: HUBER NEEDLE 22G X 1"
PIC.description: 22-gauge, 1-inch Huber non-coring needle for port access
PIC.purpose: Port access for patients with both PICC and port devices

PIC.name: GRIPPER PLUS 20G X 1"
PIC.purpose: Larger gauge port access for higher flow rates when ports are also present

PIC.name: HUBER ++ NEEDLE 20G3/4" SAFEST
PIC.description: 20-gauge, 3/4-inch safety Huber needle with protection mechanism
PIC.purpose: Needle-stick safe port access for healthcare worker protection

PIC.name: SOD CHLOR POSIH SF (10ML)
PIC.purpose: Preservative-free flushing for sensitive patients or frequent use

PIC.name: BIOPATCH ++ DISK 1" STERILE
PIC.description: Antimicrobial foam disk for catheter site protection
PIC.purpose: Provides antimicrobial barrier at PICC insertion site

PIV.name: IV START KIT MSIV-014698
PIV.description: Complete peripheral IV insertion kit with all necessary components
PIV.purpose: All-in-one kit for efficient PIV line establishment

PIV.name: CLAVE EXT SET 7" REMOV MCR CLV
PIV.description: 7-inch extension set with removable microclave connector
PIV.purpose: Extends PIV access while reducing catheter manipulation

PIV.name: IV CATH INTROCAN 22G X 1"
PIV.purpose: Standard peripheral venous access for most patients and medications

PIV.name: IV CATH INTROCAN SAFETY
PIV.description: Safety peripheral IV catheter with integrated needle protection
PIV.purpose: Needle-stick injury prevention during PIV insertion

PIV.name: NORMAL SALINE FLUSH (10ML)
PIV.description: 10mL normal saline flush specifically for PIV maintenance
PIV.purpose: Maintains PIV patency and clears medication residue

PORT.name: CENTRAL LINE DRESSING KIT
PORT.description: Sterile dressing kit specifically for central line and port care
PORT.purpose: Sterile maintenance of port access site during use

additional_supplies.name: SHARPS CONTAINER MAILBACK 1GL
additional_supplies.description: 1-gallon sharps disposal container with prepaid mailback service for safe disposal of contaminated sharps
additional_supplies.purpose: Safe containment and disposal of used needles, scalpels, and other sharp medical instruments to prevent needle-stick injuries and ensure proper biohazard waste management

additional_supplies.name: GLOVES NITRILE CHEMO PF MD
additional_supplies.description: Medium-sized powder-free nitrile gloves specifically designed for chemotherapy drug handling with enhanced chemical resistance
additional_supplies.purpose: Provides superior barrier protection when handling hazardous chemotherapy drugs and cytotoxic medications, protecting healthcare workers from chemical exposure and contamination

additional_supplies.name: STERILE DISPS DRAPE 18 X 26
additional_supplies.description: Sterile disposable surgical drape measuring 18 inches by 26 inches for creating sterile fields
additional_supplies.purpose: Establishes and maintains sterile work area during invasive procedures, port access, PICC insertions, and other sterile medical interventions to prevent surgical site infections

additional_supplies.name: ALCOHOL SWABS
additional_supplies.description: Pre-saturated alcohol prep pads containing 70% isopropyl alcohol for skin antisepsis
additional_supplies.purpose: Cleanses and disinfects skin at injection sites, port access areas, and IV insertion sites to reduce bacterial load and minimize infection risk during medical procedures

additional_supplies.name: TEGADERM 2 3/8" X 2 3/4"
additional_supplies.description: Transparent adhesive film dressing measuring 2 3/8 inches by 2 3/4 inches with waterproof and breathable properties
additional_supplies.purpose: Secures and protects IV insertion sites, catheter entry points, and small wounds while allowing visual assessment of the site and maintaining moisture vapor transmission

additional_supplies.name: TOURNIQUET ADJUSTABLE
additional_supplies.description: Reusable elastic tourniquet with adjustable tension for venous occlusion during venipuncture procedures
additional_supplies.purpose: Temporarily restricts venous blood flow to engorge veins, making them more visible and palpable for easier IV insertion, blood draws, and venous access procedures

metadata.description: Complete medical supplies database combining infusion supplies for PIC (PICC), PIV, and PORT procedures with additional medical supplies, including IRC codes, descriptions, clinical purposes, and product images
